trans-unit.source: Job Card

seg-source.mrk: Job Card

trans-unit.source: A significant number of fields and actions have been added to the Job Card for Construction Works Processing. Additionally, the information dynamically changes depending on the Structure Type of the Job (Bill of Quantities, Process and Controlling, or BoQ and PaC).

seg-source.mrk: A significant number of fields and actions have been added to the Job Card for Construction Works Processing.
Additionally, the information dynamically changes depending on the Structure Type of the Job (Bill of Quantities, Process and Controlling, or BoQ and PaC).

trans-unit.source: Job Structure Type = Bill of Quantities (BoQ)

seg-source.mrk: Job Structure Type = Bill of Quantities (BoQ)

trans-unit.source: The fields and actions on the Job Card that are specific to jobs with Structure Type = Bill of Quantities are described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: The fields and actions on the Job Card that are specific to jobs with Structure Type = Bill of Quantities are described in this section.

trans-unit.source: : Job Card for Structure Type = Bill of Quantities

seg-source.mrk: : Job Card for Structure Type = Bill of Quantities

trans-unit.source: Structure Type

seg-source.mrk: Structure Type

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the job is for calculating (Bill of Quantities) or processing (Processing and Controlling), or both (BoQ and PaC).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if the job is for calculating (Bill of Quantities) or processing (Processing and Controlling), or both (BoQ and PaC).

trans-unit.source: Subsection

seg-source.mrk: Subsection

trans-unit.source: Indicates if this job is a category of another job structure; for informational purposes only.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if this job is a category of another job structure; for informational purposes only.

trans-unit.source: Person Responsible 3 / Person Responsible 4

seg-source.mrk: Person Responsible 3 / Person Responsible 4

trans-unit.source: Two additional people can be assigned in the Construction Works Processing job. These individuals are automatically assigned to the Job Team.

seg-source.mrk: Two additional people can be assigned in the Construction Works Processing job.
These individuals are automatically assigned to the Job Team.

trans-unit.source: Project No.

seg-source.mrk: Project No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of the related Project.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of the related Project.

trans-unit.source: BoQ Blocked by

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Blocked by

trans-unit.source: Indicates a user ID who blocked the BoQ by using the calculation statistics vernier adjustment.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates a user ID who blocked the BoQ by using the calculation statistics vernier adjustment.

trans-unit.source: Invoice Model

seg-source.mrk: Invoice Model

trans-unit.source: Indicates how invoicing will be handled for this job. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates how invoicing will be handled for this job.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Performance per Period – used to invoice the service that was delivered since the last invoice was created.

seg-source.mrk: Performance per Period – used to invoice the service that was delivered since the last invoice was created.

trans-unit.source:
Cumulative Invoicing – used to invoice all delivered services including services from previous invoices. For example:
  • 1st invoice 10 pcs at 100 = 1000, amount to pay 1000
  • 2nd invoice 30 pcs at 100 = 3000, amount to pay 2000
  • 3rd invoice 100 pcs at 100 = 10000, amount to pay 7000

seg-source.mrk: Cumulative Invoicing – used to invoice all delivered services including services from previous invoices.
For example:
• 1st invoice 10 pcs at 100 = 1000, amount to pay 1000
• 2nd invoice 30 pcs at 100 = 3000, amount to pay 2000
• 3rd invoice 100 pcs at 100 = 10000, amount to pay 7000

trans-unit.source: The Calculation FastTab is used specifically for Construction Works Processing and contains one field that relates to the integration with Alloy Management: the Alloy Surcharge Date field, which defines the date for calculating alloy surcharges.

trans-unit.source: Create PaC Job

seg-source.mrk: Create PaC Job

trans-unit.source: Creates a PaC Job for the Project/BoQ Job.

seg-source.mrk: Creates a PaC Job for the Project/BoQ Job.

trans-unit.source: Calculate Rate Unit Cost

seg-source.mrk: Calculate Rate Unit Cost

trans-unit.source: Calculates the rate unit cost based on the Budget Calculation and the EFB Surcharges.

seg-source.mrk: Calculates the rate unit cost based on the Budget Calculation and the EFB Surcharges.

trans-unit.source: Import GAEB

seg-source.mrk: Import GAEB

trans-unit.source: Opens the GAEB File Import page, from where a GAEB file can be selected for import into the job structure (refer to section “Import GAEB File” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: Opens the GAEB File Import page, from where a GAEB file can be selected for import into the job structure (refer to section “Import GAEB File” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Export GAEB

seg-source.mrk: Export GAEB

trans-unit.source: Opens the Data Exchange Phase dialog where the correct phase is selected and then creates a GAEB Export file for the selected phase.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Data Exchange Phase dialog where the correct phase is selected and then creates a GAEB Export file for the selected phase.

trans-unit.source: Get GAEB Import

seg-source.mrk: Get GAEB Import

trans-unit.source: Opens the GAEB List, from which an existing GAEB record can be imported into the job structure. Used when a GAEB file was imported first into the GAEB list instead of a job; prevents the unnecessary creation of another GAEB record.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the GAEB List, from which an existing GAEB record can be imported into the job structure.
Used when a GAEB file was imported first into the GAEB list instead of a job; prevents the unnecessary creation of another GAEB record.

trans-unit.source: Create GAEB Export

seg-source.mrk: Create GAEB Export

trans-unit.source: Opens the Data Exchange Phase dialog where the correct phase is selected and then creates a GAEB Export Manager for the selected phase.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Data Exchange Phase dialog where the correct phase is selected and then creates a GAEB Export Manager for the selected phase.

trans-unit.source: Create Measurement Document

seg-source.mrk: Create Measurement Document

trans-unit.source: Creates a new measurement document and provides the ability to copy the complete BoQ into the document.

seg-source.mrk: Creates a new measurement document and provides the ability to copy the complete BoQ into the document.

trans-unit.source: Report Tab

seg-source.mrk: Report Tab

trans-unit.source: The Report tab contains the EFB-Price 221 (1a - 311.a) report, which is used with the EFB Calculation (refer to section “EFB Calculation” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: The Report tab contains the EFB-Price 221 (1a - 311.a) report, which is used with the EFB Calculation (refer to section “EFB Calculation” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Job Structure Type = Process and Controlling (PaC)

seg-source.mrk: Job Structure Type = Process and Controlling (PaC)

trans-unit.source: All fields on the Job Card with Structure Type = Process and Controlling are either the same as the standard cc|project Job Card or from the BoQ Job – there are no fields specific to this structure type. The same is true for the actions, except for three additional ones described below.

seg-source.mrk: All fields on the Job Card with Structure Type = Process and Controlling are either the same as the standard cc|project Job Card or from the BoQ Job – there are no fields specific to this structure type.
The same is true for the actions, except for three additional ones described below.
